summary: An ordinance relating to the Water Dept. and authorizing the sale and removal of alder timber and other hardwood forest materials from City owned lands in Sections 1, 2, 11 & 12, Township 22 North, Range 5 East, Sections 35 & 36, Township 23 North, Range 5 East, and Section 6, Township 22 North, Range 6 East, W.M., in the Lake Youngs Watershed Forest under contract with Madsen Brothers Firewood Co.
